00025 #ifndef ADAPTIVEINSERTION_H
00026 #define ADAPTIVEINSERTION_H
00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 #include"BiGraph.hxx"
00031 #include"IterativeHeuristic.h"
00032 #include"adaptive_insert.h"
00033 
00034 class AdaptiveInsertion: public IterativeHeuristic {
00035 protected:
00038   unsigned my_iteration_limit;
00040   unsigned iterations;
00042   unsigned long long crossings;
00043 public:
00045   AdaptiveInsertion(BiGraph & bigraph, unsigned iteration_limit):
00046     IterativeHeuristic(bigraph), my_iteration_limit(iteration_limit) {
00047     iterations = 0;
00048   }
00049 
00051   virtual void runHeuristic() {
00052     ++iterations;
00053     myBigraph.switch_sides();
00054     crossings += adaptive_insert(myBigraph);
00055     myBigraph.switch_sides();
00056     crossings += adaptive_insert(myBigraph);
00057   }
00058 
00061   virtual bool keepGoing() const {
00062     return iterations <= my_iteration_limit;
00063   }
00064 };
00065 
00066 #endif
